Infrastructure 
1. The infrastructure is not fully in line with that envisaged in the IUSS health facility standards. This may impact
patients in various ways, including that they may be admitted, observed, monitored or even deliver in areas that
were not designed for this purpose.
Emergency Medi cal Services 
1. Our institution is served by only  ambulances. This is significantly fewer than provided for in national
